name: Taking a selfie
definition: Popular photo trend. Hold up an imaginary phone and pose for a picture of yourself!

name: Streaming on Netflix
definition: Watching shows online. Sit on the couch with a remote and binge-watch!

name: Scrolling through social media
definition: Looking at your phone feed. Swipe up with your thumb endlessly!

name: Drinking coffee
definition: Morning caffeine ritual. Sip from a mug and feel energized!

name: Taking out the trash
definition: Weekly chore. Carry a heavy bag and toss it in the bin!

name: Working from home
definition: Remote office life. Type on laptop while sitting in pajamas!

name: Going to Starbucks
definition: Coffee shop visit. Order a fancy drink and spell your name!

name: Online shopping
definition: Buying things on the internet. Click, add to cart, and checkout!

name: Walking a dog
definition: Pet care routine. Hold a leash and follow your furry friend!

name: Microwaving food
definition: Quick meal prep. Put food in, press buttons, and wait for beep!

name: Charging your phone
definition: Daily tech necessity. Plug in the cable when battery is low!

name: Doing laundry
definition: Washing clothes. Load the machine, add detergent, and press start!

name: Playing Wordle
definition: Daily word puzzle game. Think hard and type in five-letter words!

name: Checking email
definition: Digital mail routine. Open inbox and delete spam!

name: Pumping gas
definition: Fueling up your car. Insert nozzle and squeeze the handle!

name: Going through TSA security
definition: Airport checkpoint. Take off shoes, empty pockets, walk through scanner!

name: Parallel parking
definition: Tricky driving maneuver. Turn wheel, back up slowly between two cars!

name: Assembling IKEA furniture
definition: Swedish furniture challenge. Read confusing instructions and use Allen wrench!

name: Password reset
definition: Forgot login process. Click 'forgot password' and check your email!

name: Zoom meeting
definition: Virtual video call. Turn on camera, realize you're on mute!

name: Taylor Swift
definition: Pop superstar known for writing songs about her exes. Shake it off!

name: Elon Musk
definition: Tech billionaire who owns Tesla and X (Twitter). Talk about Mars!

name: Beyoncé
definition: Queen Bey herself. Strike a fierce pose and own the stage!

name: LeBron James
definition: NBA basketball legend. Dribble and dunk like a king!

name: Oprah Winfrey
definition: Talk show icon. Point and say 'You get a car!'

name: The Statue of Liberty
definition: Famous New York landmark. Hold up a torch and wear a crown!

name: The Eiffel Tower
definition: Iconic Paris monument. Stand tall and point to the sky!

name: McDonald's
definition: Golden arches fast food. Say 'I'm lovin' it!'

name: Amazon Prime delivery
definition: Fast package shipping. Wait by door for cardboard box!

name: Google it
definition: Looking something up online. Type question into search bar!

name: Black Friday shopping
definition: Day after Thanksgiving chaos. Fight crowds for deals!

name: March Madness
definition: College basketball tournament. Fill out a bracket!

name: Super Bowl
definition: Biggest football game. Watch commercials and halftime show!

name: Halloween trick-or-treating
definition: Going door to door in costume. Say 'trick or treat!'

name: Fourth of July fireworks
definition: Independence Day celebration. Look up at sky and go 'oooh, ahhh!'

name: Times Square New Year's Eve
definition: NYC ball drop celebration. Count down from 10 in a huge crowd!

name: Thanksgiving turkey
definition: Holiday bird dinner. Carve and stuff yourself full!

name: SpongeBob SquarePants
definition: Yellow cartoon character. Live in a pineapple under the sea!

name: Harry Potter
definition: Boy wizard with scar. Wave a wand and say spells!

name: Star Wars lightsaber
definition: Jedi weapon. Make humming sounds and swing it around!

name: The Avengers
definition: Marvel superhero team. Assemble with Iron Man, Captain America, Thor!

name: Stranger Things
definition: Netflix show with the Upside Down. Look for Eleven!

name: Game of Thrones
definition: Epic HBO fantasy series. Winter is coming!

name: The Office
definition: Workplace mockumentary sitcom. Do Michael Scott impression!

name: Friends
definition: NYC coffee shop sitcom. Sit on the Central Perk couch!

name: Breaking Bad
definition: Chemistry teacher turns meth cook. Say 'I am the one who knocks!'

name: The Simpsons
definition: Long-running animated family. Say 'D'oh!'

name: Fortnite Battle Royale
definition: Popular shooting game. Do victory dance emotes!

name: Among Us
definition: Multiplayer deduction game. Vote out the impostor!

name: Call of Duty
definition: Military shooter video game. Aim and fire!

name: Pokémon GO
definition: AR mobile game. Walk around catching creatures!

name: Grand Theft Auto
definition: Open world crime game series. Steal cars and cause chaos!

name: The Legend of Zelda
definition: Adventure game with Link. Find triforce pieces!

name: Super Mario Bros
definition: Classic platformer game. Jump on goombas!

name: iPhone
definition: Apple's smartphone. Swipe and tap on touchscreen!

name: Tesla electric car
definition: Luxury EV vehicle. Drive silently with autopilot!

name: Bitcoin
definition: Digital cryptocurrency. Mine for virtual coins!

name: ChatGPT
definition: AI chatbot. Ask questions and get detailed answers!

name: TikTok
definition: Short video app. Scroll through endless content!

name: Instagram
definition: Photo sharing social media. Post pics with filters!

name: YouTube
definition: Video platform. Watch and subscribe to channels!

name: Uber ride
definition: Rideshare app service. Request car on phone!

name: Spotify
definition: Music streaming service. Create playlists!

name: Airbnb
definition: Vacation rental platform. Book someone's house!

name: Venmo payment
definition: Peer-to-peer money app. Split the bill digitally!

name: DoorDash delivery
definition: Food delivery service. Order meals to your door!

name: Peloton workout
definition: Stationary bike fitness. Pedal hard in a class!

name: Airpods
definition: Apple wireless earbuds. Put in ears and listen!

name: Ring doorbell
definition: Smart home camera. See who's at your door!

name: Alexa voice assistant
definition: Amazon smart speaker. Say 'Alexa' and ask a question!

name: Lady Gaga
definition: Pop star known for wild outfits. Born this way!

name: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson
definition: WWE wrestler turned actor. Flex and smell what he's cooking!

name: Kim Kardashian
definition: Reality TV star and influencer. Take selfies!

name: Donald Trump
definition: Former US President and businessman. Make exaggerated hand gestures!

name: Barack Obama
definition: 44th US President. Give inspiring speech!

name: Queen Elizabeth II
definition: British monarch. Wave regally with white gloves!

name: Serena Williams
definition: Tennis champion. Serve a powerful ace!

name: Michael Jordan
definition: NBA legend. Dunk and stick out tongue!

name: Tom Brady
definition: NFL quarterback GOAT. Throw perfect spiral!

name: Simone Biles
definition: Olympic gymnast. Do incredible flips!

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
definition: Soccer superstar. Do signature celebration!

name: BTS
definition: K-pop boy band sensation. Dance in perfect sync!

name: Billie Eilish
definition: Young pop singer. Whisper sing in baggy clothes!

name: Marvel's Black Panther
definition: Wakanda superhero. Cross arms in salute!

name: Wednesday Addams dance
definition: Viral Netflix dance scene. Do jerky gothic moves!

name: Baby Yoda (Grogu)
definition: Cute Star Wars character. Be small and use the Force!

name: Squid Game
definition: Korean survival show. Play Red Light Green Light!

name: Barbie movie
definition: 2023 pink film phenomenon. Live in Barbie Land!

name: Avatar (blue aliens)
definition: James Cameron sci-fi film. Be tall and blue on Pandora!

name: Titanic
definition: Classic romance disaster film. Stand at bow like you're flying!

name: Jurassic Park
definition: Dinosaur theme park movie. Run from T-Rex!

name: The Matrix
definition: Mind-bending sci-fi movie. Dodge bullets in slow motion!

name: Lord of the Rings
definition: Epic fantasy trilogy. Carry the ring to Mordor!

name: Frozen 'Let It Go'
definition: Disney song everyone knows. Belt it out dramatically!

name: Coachella music festival
definition: Desert music and arts festival. Wear flower crown!

name: Burning Man
definition: Nevada desert art festival. Dress wild and burn effigy!

name: Comic-Con
definition: Pop culture convention. Dress up in cosplay!

name: Disneyland
definition: Happiest place on Earth. Ride rides and meet characters!

name: Las Vegas casino
definition: Nevada gambling city. Pull slot machine lever!

name: Climate change protest
definition: Environmental activism. Hold sign and march for planet!
